AI Description: GapFiller is a software tool designed for closing gaps and improving genome assemblies by utilizing paired-end reads. It works by enabling the precise elucidation of gaps that occur during the sequencing and assembly process, ultimately enhancing the accuracy and completeness of the assembled genome.
Core Features: Utilizes Paired-End Reads For Gap Filling, Improves Genome Assembly Accuracy, Enhances Assembly Completeness, Provides Detailed Elucidation Of Sequencing Gaps
General Tags: Genome Assembly, Bioinformatics, Sequencing, Gap Filling
